text: Hoyt Stoddard Curtin (September 9, 1922 - December 3, 2000) was an American composer and music producer, the primary musical director for the Hanna- Barbera animation studio from its beginnings with The Ruff & Reddy Show in 1957 until his retirement in 1986. He composed the themes for The Flintstones and in The Jetsons. ==Other websites== * * Category:1922 births Category:2000 deaths Category:American composers Category:American songwriters Category:Writers from California Category:American movie score composers Category:Musicians from Downey, California
